official_title: To amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to establish an economic development block grant program.
short_title: Targeted Economic Development Block Grant Program Act of 1992

summary.text: Targeted Economic Development Block Grant Program Act of 1992 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to establish a targeted economic development block grant program for qualifying metropolitan cities. Authorizes appropriations.
